## MarkerManager.unregisterMarker() method

Unregister the marker by removing it from the map of markers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
unregisterMarker(id: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | The ID of the marker to unregister. |

**Returns:**

void
